game_description: A true reincarnation of your favorite match-three puzzle, Zooma is a VR adventure challenging you to master the control and go through the chapters conquering them all. Check out what happens if you mix shooting, puzzles and classic match-three in virtual reality.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Japanese, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Ukrainian
review_1: A very great game, but I wonder why is there 270 stars available on each stages, but we only get a maximum of 90 stars on 270.... 30 stages of 3 stars each = 90 ... where is the 180 stars left....?
review_2: If you loved playing Luxor / Zuma, you will probably love this one too. Colorful, fun and just all I loved about the Luxor game I played like 15 years ago. 😁 I have bought the full game now, so I am looking forward to more fun. Enjoy 👍🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
review_3: But the game is not for me. It is too repetitive and I don't exercise out of this game. Graphically it is good.
review_4: 💖Great❣game my friends I love it alot.💖
review_5: Pokerstarsvr is amazing but it says 18 + and a lot of kids are on that game they should sort it out Apart from that it's great
